subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What event marked the beginning of the Mewar dynasty?
explanation_en:
The correct answer is the Battle of Haldighati (हल्दीघर), which marked the beginning of the Mewar dynasty ruled by Maharana Pratap.
In this battle, Maharana Pratap and Akbar clashed in 1576 near Haldighati in Rajasthan, India. The battle is considered significant as it showcased Maharana Pratap's valour.
explanation_hi: मेवार निर्माण का आधारन मेवार का आधारन मेवार का आधारन मेवार
